revised_title: A Case Study of Bladder Stones and Prostate Enlargement
tldr: This article presents a case study of a patient with bladder stones and prostate enlargement. The author, Edward Nourse, describes the surgical procedure and the unique features of the stones, which were found in multiple bags formed by the protrusion of the bladder's internal membrane. The article also discusses the patient's medical history and the examination of the kidneys and ureters.
